document_data.name: ''Potion of Superheroism''
document_data.mainbody: A '''''potion of superheroism''''' was a stronger version of the ''[[potion of heroism]]''.
document_data.Powers:
When ingested, the [[potion]] granted an increase in life energy akin to the ''potion of heroism'', boosting the combat prowess of anyone who had yet to reach legendary levels of fighting skill.

These potions could be used as the [[material component]] for the ''[[Tenser's transformation]]'' [[spell]].
document_data.History: One was kept in the [[Devouring Chambers]], within [[Thaymount]]'s [[Citadel]].
document_data.Production: [[Lapis lazuli]] was an adequate base for such a potion. They may also have been made with a lock of a great hero's hair, or by [[priest]]s with access to the [[charm sphere]].
document_data.Notable Variants:
*A paste-version, made for underwater users, was found in the treasure of the kraken [[Qol'in'taroq]] around the year {{yearlinkName|1367}}.{{Cite dungeon/79/The Akriloth|77}}
* A ''[[goblet of glory]]'' could dispense a liquid that had a similar effect.{{cite book/The Magister|41}}
